text: Sebastian Brant (or Brandt) (1458 â€“ 10 May 1521) was a German humanist and satirist. He was also professor of jurisprudence in University of Basel. His moral satire Das Narrenschiff (Ship of Fools) published in 1494 made him popular German humanist. == References == Category:1457 births Category:1521 deaths Category:German writers Category:Humanists Category:Writers from Strasbourg Category:Academics of the University of Basel
title: Sebastian Brant
